item.title: Edit VO to make best quality - Upwork
item.description:
I have an approx 2:20m video - your standard interview with b-roll case study. 2 different people talking throughout.

I'm after a cleanup of the dialogue tracks. There's no loud sounds, bangs, or anything like that. I just want the voice volumes to be even throughout, and some basic noise reduction/ambience underneath added to smooth it all out.

After a very fast turnaround.

Category: Audio Editing

item.title: Youtube channel organising and developing - Upwork
item.description:
An existing official youtube channel  for a public figure is active but require better development to bring it all-together and consolidate  the hundred possible thousand of videos and shorts and Tv episodes within the channel.
The applicant should demonstrate and share similar channels that been worked on to consolidate multiple content from difference sources but related to person.  IE: different podcast interviews , different TV series hosted, Different categories but currently floating around the net and not being consolidated.  
A strategy is required on how to monetise and increase subscribers and viewrs to the channel.

Budget: $150
Posted On: June 25, 2024 05:42 UTC
Category: Brand Strategy
Skills:Brand Development, Competitive Analysis, Persona Development, YouTube Marketing, Marketing Strategy, YouTube Development, YouTube, Social Media Management

item.title: Video Editor for 90 Second Insta360 Vacation Video - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor who can edit footage from a vacation shot on Insta360 and iPhone and organize it into a captivating 90-second video. The ideal candidate should have experience working with 360 footage and be able to bring creativity and storytelling to the final product. This project requires proficient video editing skills, an understanding of the Insta360 camera, and the ability to create smooth transitions, add music, and enhance the overall visual appeal. If you have a passion for creating compelling videos and can deliver high-quality work within the specified timeframe, we would love to collaborate!

Skills required:
- Video editing
- 360 video editing
- Insta360 camera
- Storytelling
- Transitions
- Music selection

Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 05:37 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editing for SEO Application - Upwork
item.description:
first of quick task for 8/10 hours

We are looking for a skilled video editor to create a promotional video for our application . The video should be engaging, concise, and highlight the key features and benefits of our app. As a video editor, you will need to have a strong understanding of SEO concepts and be able to effectively communicate them through visuals. The ideal candidate will have experience in creating videos for marketing purposes and be proficient in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro. Prior knowledge of app promotion and SEO strategies is a plus.

Skills needed:
- Video editing
- SEO knowledge
- Creativity
- Attention to detail
- Communication skills

Hourly Range: $4.00-$8.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 05:19 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Content Writing, English, Explainer Video, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Content Writing, English, Explainer Video, Video Post-Editing
Country: India
click to apply
